EmailTemplate.name: VMworld 2014 VIP Cocktail Party.Event Reminder - Maybes
EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder & Map: VMTurbo VMworld VIP Cocktail Reception
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name}},
Three. Days. Left. We can't wait for our VIP Cocktail Reception. You indicated that you might be able to go. We really hope to see you there.
Simple recipe: Free food, Free drinks, Free giveaways (hence the term).
VMTurbo VIP Cocktail Reception Monday, August 25, 2014 | 6:00 - 8:00 p.m. Twenty Five Lusk 25 Lusk Street San Francisco, CA 94107
From the Rebellion Vanguard, Team Turbo 500 Boylston Street, Eighth Floor, Boston, MA 02116 Tel: 866.634.5087
